alert.note: Alert for Upper Columbia Basin (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 5:54PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Adams County through 645 PM PDT... At 552 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles south of Ritzville, or 25 miles northeast of Connell, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ritzville, Ralston, Pizzro, Marengo, Paha and Packard. This includes Interstate 90 in Washington between mile markers 214 and 226. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
